'''Gruffo Boffin''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Gruffo was the son of [[Uffo Boffin]] and [[Sapphira Brockhouse]]. He had one son, [[Griffo Boffin|Griffo]], born in {{SR|1346}}.<ref>{{App|Boffin}}</ref>
